assistcards.display: Your kobold ally distracts your foe with a knife, making it easier for you to aim.
assistcards.help:
Distracting Spear

Grants your attacks this round +3 Accuracy, helping avoid misses and score critical hit multipliers.

workercard.cardlines:
Kobold Rogue
Work Rating: 1
Security Rating: 2
Darkvision: +/- 1
Mining bonus +1
Upkeep: 1 nutrition
(Omnivore)
workercard.help:
Kobolds are small, numerous, and reliable workers, well suited to the underground.
Darkvision: Get a bonus to work and security in dark times/places, and a penalty in bright times/places.
Omnivore: kobolds can eat anything.
